name: The New Money Company
headline: The offshore bank for international contractors
description:
Numo is the new money company ‚Äî built to be the global bank for the newly minted generation of highly ambitious digital workers in Asia, Africa, LATAM, and beyond.

These contractors currently sit in the 95th percentile of earners in their country ‚Äî but their financial infrastructure is unstable. It's fragmented across PEOs, gig marketplaces, and consumer remittance platforms. With their local currency weakening against the US Dollar, they need control on how and when to repatriate funds. They don't just need a remittance app. They need a bank.

Numo provides international contractors with a US bank account ‚Äî and instant, low-cost payment rails to move money home. This way they can hold funds in USD up to the second they need to spend it. 

We help international contractors get paid like a local, while banking globally.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:payments; industry:compliance; industry:emerging-markets; industry:neobank; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Derrick Wolbert, Founder
founders.description: CEO at Numo. Building upside down Deel üôÉ. Previously built Hologram.com from zero to $20M ARR and closed a $65M Series B as head of revenue. In a previous life, Derrick built the embedded car computing platform used in Waymo vehicles.

founders.name: Reuben Balik, Founder
founders.description: Reuben is the CTO and co-founder of The New Money Company. Previously, he worked on the most difficult enterprise telecom integrations as the first engineer (and first employee) at Hologram.com.

founders.name: Q Carlson, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder, and CPO at Numo. Building the offshore bank for international contractors. Early designer at Flexport (W14) üö¢ ‚úàÔ∏è üöõ and Quizlet. VP Design at Hologram & project44.

#  _Get your business unstuck with instant payments_
Immediately deliver funds in every market that matters. No waiting for wires to clear or reliance on correspondent bankers. 
Track every payment in a unified dashboard with full visibility and automated reconciliation. 
[Explore MoneyGun](https://newmoneycompany.com/<./moneygun>)
[Explore MoneyGun](https://newmoneycompany.com/<./moneygun>)
Best in class FX
#  _Repatriate on your own terms_
Avoid roundtrip FX costs on working capital, keeping Dollars as Dollars, and Local Fiat as Local Fiat. 
Leverage a global network of accounts to acquire, intelligently convert, and store funds where you need for your next trade.

#  _Take on zero risk_

Plus, we take the risk if any client fails to pay. Focus on making the market and not chasing unpaid invoices.

#  _Pay vendors in far flung lands_
Instantly pay vendors, suppliers, and contractors in Hong Kong, Mongolia, Vietnam, Brazil, the Philippines, and beyond. Without any wire fees or multi-day delays. 
use case
#  _Step into the flow of funds with zero risk_
Marketplaces use Metal to step into the flow of funds, boosting margin and revenue, without compliance and financial risk. 
This simplifies your user experience, boosts volumes, and opens new revenue streams.

generated_description:
The New Money Company is a fintech startup that positions itself as the offshore bank for international contractors. Founded in 2023 and incubated as part of Y Combinator Batch W24, this San Francisco-based company initially started out under the name Numo. The mission? To serve the global banking needs of a new generation of highly ambitious digital workers from Asia, Africa, Latin America, and beyond.

What‚Äôs interesting about this demographic is that they often rank in the 95th percentile of earners in their home countries yet grapple with a convoluted financial infrastructure. Their earnings are typically spread across various platforms like PEOs and gig marketplaces, and they face the instability of local currencies, which unfortunately are often depreciating against the US dollar. In short, while they‚Äôre doing well financially, the conventional banking options available to them are not cutting it‚Äîthey need more than just a remittance app; they need a solid banking solution.

That‚Äôs where The New Money Company steps in. They offer international contractors US bank accounts, along with swift and low-cost payment systems, allowing users to control how and when their funds are repatriated. The result? Contractors can hold their income in USD right up until the moment they need it, giving them greater flexibility and security.

Their offerings include a suite of services such as the Metal Suite for trade funding and seamless transactions, MoneyGun for expedited payments, and Emerald for optimizing currency exchanges. With a small but focused team of just four employees led by Group Partner Brad Flora, the company is clearly geared towards tackling the unique challenges faced by contractors in emerging markets. 

Key tags associated with the company reflect their core focus areas: fintech, payments, compliance, emerging markets, and neobanking. They aim to empower their users and facilitate borderless financial interactions.

In essence, The New Money Company is more than just a fintech venture; it's a catalyst for economic opportunity, striving to rewrite the narrative for freelancers and international contractors navigating a fragmented financial landscape. If you're interested, you can check them out at [New Money Company](https://newmoneycompany.com).
